landingPage.welcomeDescription: Do you feel that it is time-consuming and tiring to organize and transfer materials in your classes? Meet Edukurs - an innovative platform that makes it easy to transfer files, projects and assignments in your courses!
landingPage.whyDescription: Edukurs was created for teachers and students who want to manage their assignments and course materials more efficiently.
landingPage.howWorksDescription: Edukurs is a platform that allows teachers to create courses and share materials with students. Students can easily access the materials and submit their projects.
